content: **knitted wrap cardigan in garter st and crochet edge for baby in drops babymerino size premature - 4 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see peek-a-boo hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ babydrops 25-11 drops design pattern no bm-045-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **size** premature 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years finished measurements bust 36 42-48-52-56 60-66 cm / 14¼ 16½ -19 -20½ -22 23½ -26 full length 20 24-28-30-32 36-40 cm / 8 9½ -11 -11¾ -12½ 14¼ -15¾ **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio 100 150-150-150-150 200-200 g color no 02 off white 50 g for all sizes in color no 23 light beige drops circular needle 60 or 80 cm / 24 or 32 size 3 mm / us 2 5 - or size needed to get 24 sts x 48 row in garter st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm/ c - for edges and ties 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b25-10-peek-a-boo
